text: The 1906 Tempe Normal Owls football team was an American football team that represented Tempe Normal School (later renamed Arizona State University) as an independent during the 1906 college football season. In their eighth and final season under head coach Frederick M. Irish, the Owls compiled a 0–2 record and were outscored by their opponents by a combined total of 22 to 6. The team lost games to the Phoenix Indian School (6–17) and Tempe High School (0–5). ==References== Tempe Normal Category:Arizona State Sun Devils football seasons Category:College football winless seasons Category:1906 in Arizona Territory
title: 1906 Tempe Normal Owls football team
